desc: Huski Home is a family-run business based in Southeast London, U.K. that creates helpful eco-friendly homewares out of natural waste such as rice husk creating sustainable products like reusable travel cups and lunch boxes and kitchen utensils and bowls out of natural coconut husk and coconut wood

layout.text: Eco-consciously handmade, our coconut bowl soy wax candles are beautifully fragrant
